Common digestive conditions include IBS, acid reflux, heartburn, constipation, bloating, loose stool, gastritis, abdominal pain etc. We tailor each acupuncture treatment to each individual and modify treatment approaches as changes occur and as people start getting better. In this way, we can get to the root of the issues rather simply masking symptoms. We target long lasting and sustainable health through effective treatments, diet and lifestyle changes.
